mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `board` ( user_nick, name, category, content, views, created_date ) VALUES ( #{user_nick}, #{name}, #{category}, #{content}, 0, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE category = #{category} AND (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')) ORDER BY board_idx DESC
